name: glaciate
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This attack reduces the targets’ Speed stat.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This attack reduces the targets’ Speed stat.
